review:
We want to extend our deepest gratitude to Dr Karthika Devi and the Physician assistant of Gynaecology Roopna for the exceptional care and support during the delivery of our baby girl on June 7th, 2024, at Belenus Champion Hospital. Your expertise, professionalism, and compassion made a world of difference to us during this special moment in our lives.

Your dedication and attention to detail ensured a smooth and safe delivery, and we are truly grateful for the exceptional care we received under your guidance. Thank you for going above and beyond to make sure both baby and mother were well taken care of.

With Best Regards,
Ranjeeta Singh, Pradeep Kumar

I am blessed with a baby girl with all the support and guidance from Dr. Karthika mam.  4 signs of labour emergency during my last consultation helped me a lot.

The confidence, empathy and guidance, exercise and tips in the  labour room resulted into normal delivery with healthy baby and mother, I can proudly tell I am blessed to get Dr. Karthika mam.

She is the one who gave us all the strength and positivity throughout my wife pregnancy. I will definitely recommend Dr. Karthika  Devi for everyone who are looking for best gynaecologist in Bangalore.She is very polite, she listen all the concern patiently and then clarifies every doubt. She gives comfort to the patient so that we can discuss even single doubt we have in our mind.From the day 1 we were looking for doctor who can help us in the normal delivery and at last it became possible because of the Dr. Karthika Devi.

*** ** *** **** ****** **** * **** **** *********** 

Blessed with 2 angles only because of Dr Karthika Devi.

Thanks a ton to this wonderful person.
